news.title: To ease acquisition hurdle, Ghaziabad development body plans to notify township land
news.para: Ghaziabad Development Authority (GDA) is set to expedite the Harnandipuram township project by invoking the Land Acquisition Act. Frustrated by slow progress via mutual consent, with only 14 hectares acquired since March, GDA seeks to secure the remaining 470 hectares swiftly.

news.title: ED probe exposes misuse of Dharani for ₹17 crore land fraud
news.para: Enforcement Directorate's investigation uncovers a fraudulent land acquisition scheme in Nagaram village, exploiting the Dharani Portal. A false affidavit claiming sole heirship was accepted without verification, enabling the illegal succession of government land. This manipulation, involving forged documents and bypassed checks, led to the sale of the land for over ₹17.50 crore.

news.title: Kolkata: Pay upto ₹1 lakh for littering vacant plots in New Town
news.para: To combat illegal waste dumping, the New Town Kolkata Development Authority (NKDA) is installing warning display boards in vacant plots, threatening fines from Rs 1,000 to Rs 1 lakh. Residents have complained about these plots becoming dumping grounds and mosquito breeding sites.

news.title: Noida authority crackdowns on unauthorised construction in Salarpur village
news.para: Noida Authority is cracking down on illegal construction in Salarpur. Buildings, some seven stories high, were built without approval. The Authority deployed teams for daily inspections. Notices were issued to developers who ignored them. The CEO warns buyers about financial risks. The Authority plans similar actions in other areas. They will also urge action against illegal groundwater usage.

news.title: Lucknow development body plans 300-acre logistics park, 15,000 plots in Varun Vihar scheme
news.para: Lucknow Development Authority is set to launch Varun Vihar, a massive 5,610-acre housing and infrastructure project along the Agra Expressway. The scheme includes over 15,000 residential and commercial plots, a 300-acre logistics park, and an ISBT. LDA aims for international standards, incorporating green spaces, a golf course, and a central park.

news.title: Apartment owners seek rollback of RWA GST
news.para: The online petition started on change.org by BAF stated, “This notification states that GST is applicable on the entire monthly maintenance charges collected by Residential Welfare Associations (RWAs) if such charges exceed Rs 7500 per month per member or residential unit.” It highlighted that an increase in living expenses affects middle-class families the hardest, forcing them to adjust their budgets and compromise on their essential needs.

news.title: Lucknow: All cases against Ansal group transferred to crime branch
news.para: Lucknow Police are consolidating 293 FIRs against Ansal Properties & Infrastructure Ltd (APIL) under the Crime Branch to expedite justice for defrauded homebuyers. The investigation aims to untangle a complex web of real estate fraud involving cheating, forgery, and land encroachment spanning two decades. The LDA has accused Ansal of selling mortgaged land and failing to clear significant dues.

news.title: Telangana RERA penalises Vasavi Realtors LLP for delay in handing over flats
news.para: Telangana RERA has directed Vasavi Realtors LLP to compensate flat buyers of the Vasavi Lake City project due to delayed possession. The order mandates a 10.8% annual interest payment to 23 aggrieved buyers, effective from March 1, 2024, until the flats are handed over.

news.title: What ails 'new sectors' of Noida even after a decade
news.para: Residents of Noida's 7x and 100x sectors are facing a decade-long wait for basic amenities. Despite promises, essential infrastructure like proper roads, local transport, petrol pumps, and designated commercial spaces remain inadequate. The lack of banks, ATMs, and waste management solutions further compounds the problems for over 3 lakh residents, highlighting a significant gap in development.

news.title: Higher base price set by Mysuru development body inflates realty rates in Vijayanagar
news.para: The Mysuru Development Authority's inflated base prices for sites in Vijayanagar Stage IV, Phase II, are negatively impacting the real estate sector in west Mysuru. Developers claim these prices have created an artificial bubble, prompting other property owners to hike their rates.

news.title: Enforcement directorate raids 17 locations of builders in Jaipur
news.para: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) conducted raids on 17 locations in Jaipur, targeting real estate businessmen including Gyan Chand Agarwal, Jugal Kishor Derawala, and others, following a PMLA case registered in June 2025. The investigation revealed links to foreign investments in Dubai, Singapore, Cyprus, and Hong Kong.

news.title: Applied Materials leases 8.06 lakh sq ft office space for ₹855 crore over 10 years
news.para: Applied Materials has leased 8.06 lakh sq ft of office space in Bengaluru for Rs 855 crore over 10 years. This expansion will accommodate their growing operations and support their new Innovation Center for Semiconductor Manufacturing. The R&D fab represents a Rs 4,851 crore investment and is expected to create approximately 1,500 jobs, boosting Karnataka's semiconductor industry.

news.title: Blackstone buys office building in Paris for $819 million
news.para: Blackstone has confirmed its acquisition of the Centre d'Affaires, a prestigious office building in Paris, for approximately 700 million euros. This purchase from Union Investments signals a renewed investor interest in prime office properties following a pandemic-induced slump.

news.title: Kartik Aaryan makes debut land investment with 2,000 sq ft plot in Alibaug
news.para: Alibaug has seen increased real estate and tourism activity in recent years, supported by infrastructure upgrades such as the Mumbai Trans Harbour Link (MTHL), the Navi Mumbai International Airport, and improved road and jetty connectivity. These infrastructure related developments have driven demand for premium plotted projects and second homes, positioning Alibaug as a preferred residential location near Mumbai.

news.title: Arkade Developers acquires Woollen & Textile Industries
news.para: Arkade Developers has acquired 100% shareholding in Woollen and Textile Industries which includes 14,363.60 sq meters land parcel for a total consideration for the deal is ₹148 crore.

news.title: MUFG to launch $680 million Japan real estate fund
news.para: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group is set to launch a 100 billion yen fund to invest in Japanese real estate, capitalizing on rising property prices and anticipated interest rate hikes. The fund will target underperforming assets, focusing on mid-sized offices, residential properties, and hotels in major cities like Tokyo and Osaka.

news.title: Final land plan schedule for Coimbatore metro to be completed within two months
news.para: Coimbatore Metro Rail project is progressing swiftly, with CMRL expected to finalize land plans, including asset valuation, for its two corridors within two months. An urgent plan for a congested 1.4km stretch has been submitted for validation. Surveys and mapping are complete, and a double-decker construction on Avinashi Road is under consideration, pending further studies and approvals.

news.title: Received consent for 50% land of new Purandar airport: District collector
news.para: Nearly half the farmers in seven affected villages have consented to land acquisition for the proposed Purandar airport, according to District Collector Jitendra Dudi. Around 1,450 acres out of the revised 3,000 acres have been approved for acquisition.
